Q70 SBS buses are fare free for the Thanksgiving holiday week

Until 11:59 PM Sun, Nov 26

Ride free on the LaGuardia Link Q70 SBS. Customers do not have to
obtain a Select Bus Service ticket and may board at any door.

Click here for LaGuardia Airport travel advisories.

Note: Customers transferring to the subway will still have to pay the subway fare.
